cards.rules_text: Falling Anvil deals damage to target creature equal to the number of artifact you control.

Whenever Mind Control Hat is equipped to a creature, gain control of it until it is unequipped.
{3}{U}{U}, {T}: Attach Mind Control Hat. You may activate the ability of another Gadget you control without paying its mana cost. Activate only during your main phase.

Vigilance, zany [i](Whenever this creature dies, shuffle it into its owner's library.)[/i]
Whenever you activate the ability of an artifact, you may sacrifice it. When you do so, it deals damage equal to its mana value to any target and to Wil.E Coyote. Then, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
Whenever this enchantment or an artifact enters under your control, create a 2/2 white and blue Toon Detective token creature with vigilance. This ability only trigger once per turn.

Stretch [i](When you cast this spell, you may pay any amount of life.)[/i]
Menace
Whenever this creature enters, for each 3 life paid to cast it, create a token that's a copy of it.

Trample, Zany [i](Whenever this creature dies, shuffle it into its owner's library.)[/i]
Inertia [i](At the beginning of your end step, if you cast a spell this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Otherwise, remove all counters from this creature at the beginning of the next turn.)[/i]
Whenever a spell would counter another spell, counter the first spell instead.

cards.rules_text:

When this artifact enters, create a 1/1 red Toon creature token.

Ride the Rocket deals 3 damage to target creature. If you paid 3 or more life to cast this spell, it deals 5 damage instead.

When this artifact enters, create a 1/1 red Toon creature token.
{1}{U}{U}, {T}: Up to two creatures you control gain flying until end of turn. You may activate the ability of a Gadget you control without paying its mana cost. Activate only during your main phase.

Creatures your opponents control can't block this turn.

Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the amount of life paid to cast this card. Put up to three creature cards with mana value 3 or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

Destroy target creature with mana value two or less.
Surprise {1}{B}{B} [i]({1}{B}{B}, discard this card: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card with the same mana value. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)[/i]

Inertia [i](At the beginning of your end step, if you cast a spell this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Otherwise, remove all counters from this creature at the beginning of the next turn.)[/i]
Whenever this creature attack, if it has three or more +1/+1 counters, double its power. It gains trample until end of turn.

Flying, vigilance, lifelink
Inertia [i](At the beginning of your end step, if you cast a spell this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Otherwise, remove all counters from this creature at the beginning of the next turn.)[/i]
At the beginning of your upkeep, if this creature has three or more +1/+1 counters, it gains indestructible until end of turn.

Stretch [i](When you cast this spell, you may pay any amount of life.)[/i]
Trample
This creature enters with an additional +1/+1 counter for each 2 life paid to cast it.

Crew 3
Inertia [i](At the beginning of your end step, if you cast a spell this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this artifact. Otherwise, remove all counters from this artifact.)[/i]
Whenever you remove counters from this artifact, create that many Food tokens.
{2}, {T}, sacrifice a Food: Draw a card.

Trample
Surprise {2}{G}{G} [i]({2}{G}{G}, discard this card: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card with the same mana value. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)[/i]

Whenever this artifact enters, draw a card.
{4}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life. Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. If you activate this ability during your main phase, you may activate the ability of a Gadget you control without paying its mana cost

Whenever this artifact enters, scry 1.
{5}, {T}: Draw a card. If you activate this ability during your main phase, you may activate the ability of a Gadget you control without paying its mana cost

Whenever you pay life, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. It deals 1 damage to each opponent.
{3}{B}{R}, Pay 2 life: Exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play this card.

Inertia [i](At the beginning of your end step, if you cast a spell this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Otherwise, remove all counters from this creature at the beginning of the next turn.)[/i]
Whenever a counter is removed from this this creature, draw that many cards and create that many Food tokens.

Whenever this artifact enters, create a 1/1 white Fairy creature token with flying.
{1}{W}{W}, {T}: Create a 1/1 white Fairy creature token with flying. You may activate the ability of another Gadget you control without paying its mana cost. Activate only during your main phase.

+1/+1 counters on creatures you control can't be removed outside of costs.

Vigilance, zany [i](Whenever this creature dies, shuffle it into its owner's library.)[/i]
